resources.string: Oggolaanshaha goobta waa in la furo
Waa inaad aqbashaa ogolaanshaha goobta ee Securitly inuu ku shaqeeyo
Hi, waxaan ahay Emma, \u200b\u200bbatterigaygu waa dhintay.
Securitly wuxuu u baahan yahay inuu ogaado goobtaada mar kasta

Ma rabtaa in aad awood u yeelatid goobtaada?
Tag Settings -> Apps -> Securitly -> Had iyo jeer oggolow goobta.

Markaa dib u bilow Securitly
Dir fariin degdeg ah marka heerka batteriga uu yahay
Dib u deji xogta caadiga ah
Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad dib u dejiso xogta caadiga ah?
Fariinta si sax ah loo kaydiyay
Ma doonaysaa in aad xidhiidhkan ka tirtirto liiska xidhiidhkaaga?

1. Securitly wuxuu u baahan yahay inuu ogaado goobtaada mar kasta. Si taas loo sameeyo, u gudub qalabkaaga Settings -> apps -> Securitly -> Ogolaanshaha oo beddel oggolaanshaha goobta si aad "Oggolow mar walba".
2.Ha ku qasbin xidhidh Securitly. Haddii kale, fariintaada degdega ah looma diri doono dadka aad la xidhiidho.
3. Kuma talineyno inaad dejiso heerka batteriga ee aad fariinta degdega ah u diri doonto 1 ama 2%, maadaama laga yaabo in qalabkaagu damiyo kahor inta aanad fariinta dirin.

Appkan waxaa sameeyay 5 arday oo ka socda Machadka Farsamada ee Laguna, Mexico. Mashruucani waxa uu ku bilaabmay fikrad aanu dejinay si aanu u xaqiijino, anaga oo kaashanayna khabiirkayaga, injineer Gerardo, ayaanu suurtogelinay. Appkan waxa aanu rajaynaynaa in aanu wax yar ku biirinno xaalada wakhtigan ee aduunka.

Meeshii u dambaysay ee aaladdaydu waxay ahayd:
loolka:
40.776570
Longitude: -73.969979
Central Park West Historic Degmada
New York, 10024, EE. UU.
Securitly ma shaqayn karo sababtoo ah "Send SMS" ogolaansho lama siin

Securitly ma shaqayn karo sababtoo ah "Mar walba Goobta" ogolaanshaha lama bixiyo. Securitly waxay u baahan tahay inay ogaato goobtaada si ay ugu soo dirto goobtaadii ugu dambeysay ee la yaqaanay xiriirada aad dooratay
Khalad baa ka dhacay helidda goobta la kala saaray ee qalabkan
Ha muujin "goobta loo baahan yahay" ee soo booda marka Securitly bilowdo
